name: Arms Evolution: ZOMBIE DESTROYER
description:
Game Features

  • Roguelite Tower Defense
 Face thousands of waves of undead in randomly generated levels. Cultivate stronger weapons continuously to annihilate the endless hordes of enemies.

  • Unique Progression Rewards
 Distinguishing itself from other tower defense games, in "Arms Evolution," you can save and inherit the weapons used in each playthrough after clearing a level. This allows you to quickly advance through the early stages in subsequent games and challenge higher difficulties.

  • Endless Evolution of Weapons
 The weapon system is the core gameplay of "Arms Evolution." Weapons in the game are equipped with RPG-like attribute and skill systems. You can continuously cultivate and evolve all the weapons that appear in the game, making them infinitely powerful.



  • Special Talent Systems
 The starmap and cloud map are the talent systems in "Super Weapon Evolution." Their shapes and content are randomly generated, and while retaining the learned talents, you can continuously reset, refresh, or create new starmaps and cloud maps to select the most meaningful talent effects for your arsenal.



  • Additional AFK Progression
 In "Arms Evolution," besides the main game modes mentioned above, there's also the "Battle of Evolution" mode, where you can AFK and receive rewards after completing the early cultivation phase. The stronger the weapons you've cultivated, the more rewards you'll receive during AFK time.

  • Endless Challenges
 "Arms Evolution" offers unlimited weapon levels and difficulty. As long as you're willing, you can continuously battle in the game, equipped with various deadly weapons, and thoroughly eliminate the endless zombies and monsters. Enjoy the thrill of victory!

On this planet devoid of survivors, filled with death and despair, you must use various deadly weapons to eliminate the constantly invading zombies, nest insects, and monsters in the gates of hell. Strategically utilize equipment, precisely adjust weapon attributes, and configure upgraded technologies and talents to have a chance at survival in the darkness.
